title: Results Migration Gravel Race Stage 1: Mud and Mayhem in the Maasai Mara
content:
The Kenyan gravel race opens with wins from Xaverine Nirere of Team Amani and Lawrence Naesen.

Read the full article at Results Migration Gravel Race Stage 1: Mud and Mayhem in the Maasai Mara on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
